ReadingPractice: Task 1. Find the word in the passages that best suits each of the following definitions. 1._______Establish to start an organization that is intended to continue for a long time 2._______To have something inside 3._______A group/ groups of animals and plants 4._______A state of continuing to live or exit 5._______Related to an area near a tropical area 6._______A state of being polluted
